languages.text: "Предательство — это когда ты бьешь своих в спину. Я же использую врагов, чтобы обогатить {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империум{/g}. Деньги вращают жернова войны, и коль слуги Императора должны вести войну и днем и ночью даже здесь, на границе пустоты и вдали от {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святой Терры{/g}, им как никогда нужен презренный металл — в карманах и в обороте".

traits.locale_text: "Предательство — это когда ты бьешь своих в спину. Я же использую врагов, чтобы обогатить {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империум{/g}. Деньги вращают жернова войны, и коль слуги Императора должны вести войну и днем и ночью даже здесь, на границе пустоты и вдали от {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святой Терры{/g}, им как никогда нужен презренный металл — в карманах и в обороте".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Emperor are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."
languages.original_text: "Предательство — это когда ты бьешь своих в спину. Я же использую врагов, чтобы обогатить {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империум{/g}. Деньги вращают жернова войны, и коль слуги Императора должны вести войну и днем и ночью даже здесь, на границе пустоты и вдали от {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святой Терры{/g}, им как никогда нужен презренный металл — в карманах и в обороте".

traits.locale_text: "A betrayal means driving a knife in your people's back. I am using the enemies to enrich the Imperium. Money makes the millstones of war go round, and since the servants of the Great Once are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from the Holy Terra, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A betrayal means driving a knife in your people's back. I am using the enemies to enrich the Imperium. Money makes the millstones of war go round, and since the servants of the Great Once are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from the Holy Terra, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the Imperium. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Exalted One are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from Holy Terra, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."

Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Exalted One are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from Holy Terra, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."

traits.locale_text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Emperor are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Emperor are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “背叛指的是在自己人背后捅刀，但我却在利用敌人来充实{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的国库。只有金钱才能推动战争的磨盘。帝皇的仆人就在这在虚空的边缘，在这远离{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}的地方，与敌人进行着永无休止的战斗。他们比以往更加需要我依靠非法手段赚来的黄金，无论是在他们口袋里，还是在他们手中。”
languages.original_text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Emperor are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."

traits.locale_text: “背叛指的是在自己人背后捅刀，但我却在利用敌人来充实{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的国库。只有金钱才能推动战争的磨盘。帝皇的仆人就在这在虚空的边缘，在这远离{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}的地方，与敌人进行着永无休止的战斗。他们比以往更加需要我依靠非法手段赚来的黄金，无论是在他们口袋里，还是在他们手中。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the Imperium. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Emperor are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from Holy Terra, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."

languages.text: «La traición es clavarle una daga a uno de los tuyos por la espalda. Yo estoy usando a nuestros enemigos para enriquecer al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. El dinero alimenta las forjas de la guerra, y, ya que los sirvientes del Emperador están librando sus batallas sin fin incluso aquí, al borde del vacío y muy lejos de la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sagrada Terra{/g}, necesitan mi sucio oro más que nunca, tanto en sus bolsillos como en circulación».
languages.original_text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Emperor are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."

traits.locale_text: «La traición es clavarle una daga a uno de los tuyos por la espalda. Yo estoy usando a nuestros enemigos para enriquecer al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. El dinero alimenta las forjas de la guerra, y, ya que los sirvientes del Emperador están librando sus batallas sin fin incluso aquí, al borde del vacío y muy lejos de la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sagrada Terra{/g}, necesitan mi sucio oro más que nunca, tanto en sus bolsillos como en circulación».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「裏切りとは、仲間の背中にナイフを突き立てることさ。あたしは{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}を豊かにするために敵を利用している。金は戦争の石臼を回す、そして、皇帝のしもべたちは、{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}聖なる地球{/g}から離れたこの虚空の果てでも、絶え間ない戦いを続けている。彼らは、あたしの出来損ないの金を、ポケットと流通の両方で、これまでにないほど必要としているのさ」
languages.original_text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Emperor are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."

traits.locale_text: 「裏切りとは、仲間の背中にナイフを突き立てることさ。あたしは{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}を豊かにするために敵を利用している。金は戦争の石臼を回す、そして、皇帝のしもべたちは、{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}聖なる地球{/g}から離れたこの虚空の果てでも、絶え間ない戦いを続けている。彼らは、あたしの出来損ないの金を、ポケットと流通の両方で、これまでにないほど必要としているのさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Verrat heißt, einem der eigenen Leute ein Messer in den Rücken zu rammen. Ich nutze unsere Feinde, um das {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} zu bereichern. Geld sorgt dafür, dass die Mühlräder des Krieges sich drehen. Und da die Diener des Imperators ihren unaufhörlichen Kampf selbst hier austragen, am Rande der Leere, weit vom {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Heiligen Terra{/g} entfernt, brauchen sie mein illegal verdientes Gold dringender denn je zuvor. Sowohl in ihren Taschen als auch im Umlauf."
languages.original_text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Emperor are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."

traits.locale_text: "Verrat heißt, einem der eigenen Leute ein Messer in den Rücken zu rammen. Ich nutze unsere Feinde, um das {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} zu bereichern. Geld sorgt dafür, dass die Mühlräder des Krieges sich drehen. Und da die Diener des Imperators ihren unaufhörlichen Kampf selbst hier austragen, am Rande der Leere, weit vom {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Heiligen Terra{/g} entfernt, brauchen sie mein illegal verdientes Gold dringender denn je zuvor. Sowohl in ihren Taschen als auch im Umlauf."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Un traître est quelqu'un qui plante un couteau dans le dos d'un ami. Moi, je me sers de nos ennemis pour enrichir l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. L'argent fait tourner la machine de guerre, et comme les serviteurs de l'Empereur mènent leurs perpétuels combats jusqu'ici, au bord du vide et loin de la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sainte Terra{/g}, ils ont plus que jamais besoin de mon or mal acquis, aussi bien dans leurs poches qu'en circulation. »
languages.original_text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Emperor are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."

traits.locale_text: « Un traître est quelqu'un qui plante un couteau dans le dos d'un ami. Moi, je me sers de nos ennemis pour enrichir l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. L'argent fait tourner la machine de guerre, et comme les serviteurs de l'Empereur mènent leurs perpétuels combats jusqu'ici, au bord du vide et loin de la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sainte Terra{/g}, ils ont plus que jamais besoin de mon or mal acquis, aussi bien dans leurs poches qu'en circulation. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "İhanet, kendinden olanları sırtından bıçaklamak demektir. Ben düşmanlarımızı {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'u{/g} zenginleştirmek için kullanıyorum. Para, savaşın sebep olduğu sayısız düğümü çözer. İmparator'un hizmetkârları {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Kutsal Terra'dan{/g} bu kadar uzakta, uçsuzun kenar köşesinde bile sonu gelmez bir savaşta mücadele ediyor. Gayri meşru altınlarıma hem ceplerinde hem de tedavülde hiç olmadığı kadar muhtaçlar."
languages.original_text: "Betrayal means driving a knife in the back of one of your own. I am using our enemies to enrich the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Money makes the millstones of war turn, and since the servants of the Emperor are fighting their ceaseless battle even here, at the edge of the void and away from {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, they need my misbegotten gold more than ever, both in their pockets and in circulation."

traits.locale_text: "İhanet, kendi tarafından birinin sırtına bıçak sokmak demektir. Ben düşmanlarımızı {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'u zenginleştirmek için kullanıyorum. Para, savaşın sebep olduğu sayısız düğümü çözer. İmparator'un hizmetkârları burada, {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Kutsal Terra{/g}'dan uzaktaki uçsuz köşesinde bile sonu gelmez bir savaşta mücadele ettikler için, benim gayri meşru altınıma hiç olmadığı kadar ihtiyaç duyarlar. Hem ceplerinde hem de sirkülasyonda."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
